prompts: Create a whimsical poison-type Pokemon that floats and has a playful demeanor.
I want a cartoonish creature that emits gas and has a round, purple body.
Generate a cute Pokemon with a bubbly personality and a penchant for mischief.
Make a quirky Pokemon that spreads clouds of toxic gas and has a cheerful smile.
Imagine a small, round Pokemon that loves to play in urban areas and cause trouble.
Design a playful, amorphous Pokemon that can easily blend into a city environment.
Show me a Pokemon that has a jolly expression and releases colorful gas clouds.
